category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MRMPlugCSYSPrefixes
preference.preference_description: Customizes the prefixes of the machine-sided (plug) coordinate system names that are used for Resource Manager automatic positioning. Teamcenter checks coordinate system names in the precedence that is defined in this preference. Valid Values: Accepts a list of strings representing the custom prefixes for names of coordinate systems.
